CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(Employee__r.Employment_Type__c , "Full Time"), Total_Hours__c >= 40, IF( ISPICKVAL(Employee__r.Employment_Type__c, "Part Time"), Total_Hours__c >= 20, IF( ISPICKVAL(Employee__r.Employment_Type__c, "Internship"), Total_Hours__c >= 10, FALSE ) ) )
CustomField.label: Met Weekly Hours
